review: Showed up early and fixed my screen quickly for a fair price! What more can you ask for?
name: Jeff D.

review: Great customer service! I shopped around before making an appointment and this was the best price with 5 starts so I figured I would try it! Shattered my iPhone 6 screen and contacted Jacob on Sunday, by Monday my phone was fixed! Super easy making an appointment and no more than 5-10 minutes later my phone was fixed! Thank you!!
name: Jessica D.

review: It was during my trip when I dropped my phone and the screen cracked. Luckily I found this service on yelp and gave them a call. I gave them the address to my work place and they were able to come to me to fix my phone. I love how convenient they were and it only took 10 min to have my screen fixed. To fix my iPhone 6 was $110 which is not bad given how great their service was. Highly recommend them.
name: Patrick N.
